Package ca.qc.johnabbott.cs406.terrain

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.qc.johnabbott.cs406.terrain.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents a position in the terrain. A location never changes (notice there is no setter for x and y coordinates), but you can "update" a location using the move method: 

      Location pos = terrain.getStart();
  pos = pos.get(Direction.UP);
    Author:
    Ian Clement (ian.clement@johnabbott.qc.ca)
